Package com.ftm.iamweb.controllers

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AttributeViewController
    Managed Bean that map the extra attributes data provided between the UI layer and the business layer
    IdentityFacade
    Facade class to create link the Data layer with UI layer
    IdentityViewController
    Main controller that performs the CRUD operations using Facade pattern to access Identity DAO injection with Spring
    PageViewController
    Cross controller in charge of verifying that the session is valid and depending on that, redirect to Index page
    UserLoginViewController
    Managed bean that map the user data provided between the UI layer and the business layer
